ej,blacb001,M,joycj901,Arguing that batted ball struck batter $Michael Barrett did not run as he claimed ball hit his foot; HP umpire Jim Joyce called for ball, examined it and ruled the play stood; SD manager Bud Black argued and was ejected

ej,gonzf801,M,westj901,Reversal of call from double to foul ball $first pitch to Hanley Ramirez was hooking line drive past 3B; 3B umpire Chris Guccione called it fair, Alfredo Amezaga scored and Ramirez had double; San Diego manager Bud Black argued it was foul; the umpires huddled and reversed call, removing double; it was not clear which umpire reversed the call; Florida manager Fredi Gonzalez came to argue and was warned away by crew chief Joe West, umpiring at 2B; Gonzalez began to argue and was immediately ejected by West
